name: TouchDesigner to FadeCandy
tagline: Touch Designer to Fade Candy App using Spout and Cinder
body:
### TouchDesigner to FadeCandy
This repo consists of a C++ app and sample Touch Designer 088 file for sending TOP data from Touch to a [FadeCandy](https://github.com/scanlime/fadecandy) LED controller.

You will need to run the fc server, the cinder app and the touch designer file. 

### Touch Sample
The sample TouchDesigner file is from a Halloween LED Portal I made using five 8x8 led grids from ada electronics along with a single 64 led strip. There are a few different effects and a simple simulator. 

### Cinder Sample
The Cinder Sample code creates a Spout receiver and runs a custom effect routine to map the incoming TOP to Fadecandy.
